span.p: Matrix Interface Board Enclosure is the central nerve system of the multi-engine arrays. MIBEs provide low latency, high-speed engine interconnect and ensure overall system availability. Two redundant MIBEs reside in System Bay 2, each connecting to every engine in the array.
MIBEs feature their own power supply/cooling modules and redundant fabric ports to the System Interface Boards (SIBs) of each engine in the array.
